dict.acceptation: 意味(mean的现在分词)；意思是；

sent.orig: The meaning of a certain word has gone beyond it original meaning primary meaning.
sent.trans: 留学解答资讯网：“某个词的意思已经超越其原有的含义了”用英文怎么说呢？

sent.orig: Have of may and there are typeface meaning and image meaning, but have no implicit meaning.
sent.trans: 有的可能兼有字面意义和形象意义，但没有隐含意义。

sent.orig: In semantics, conceptual meaning( sense), also called referential meaning, is the core of meaning.
sent.trans: 在语义学中，词的概念意义是词义的核心，也就是所指意义。

sent.orig: The sentential meaning is the result of interaction of lexical meaning and grammatical meaning.
sent.trans: 句子意义则是由词汇意义和语法意义共同作用的结果。

sent.orig: The meaning morphemes convey may be of two kinds: lexical meaning and grammatical meaning.
sent.trans: 语素表达的意义有两种：词汇意义和语法意义。
